entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over the Cypress Hills. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:48 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:48 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
